title: Be Aware
text: I had three days to visit San Francisco and I booked this hotel on-line previous research on the web site.Result:No breakfast area nor Complimentary Continental BreakfastNo refrigerator,microwave or coffee maker as indicatedDirty Room -towels,sheets,blankets includedAsked to have clean stuff...probably they don't have clean stuff at all...Complimentary Parking...if you're lucky to find a spotNoise coming from the street "horrible"Some guests checked-in at 9.00 p.m., they ran and screamed all over the place 'til midnight...I called the owner and he ignored me..Called 911 they showed up an hour later.You want to go to San Francisco...pick something else..for the same price too...
